description.value:
Your patron is a lord or lady of the fey, a creature of legend who holds secrets that were forgotten before the mortal races were born. This being's motivations are often inscrutable, and sometimes whimsical, and might involve a striving for greater magical power or the settling of age-old grudges. Beings of this sort include the Prince of Frost; the Queen of Air and Darkness, ruler of the Gloaming Court; Titania of the Summer Court; her consort Oberon, the Green Lord; Hyrsam, the Prince of Fools; and ancient hags.

The Archfey Features

1st Level: @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-class-features.Z4s2uNkCQst6HFz0]{Expanded Spells}, @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-class-features.yEF6gqxsk6NhAeM4]{Fey Presence}

6th Level: @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-class-features.ubA140etu8ItPhMo]{Misty Escape}

10th Level: @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-class-features.J70kLmVYR9LWzQ6V]{Beguiling Defenses}

14th Level: @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-class-features.WStcQdlUxqmTFMtu]{Dark Delirium}
